{{cpp/keyword/title|{{tt|not}}}}
{{cpp/keyword/navbar}}

===Usage===
* [[cpp/language/operator alternative|alternative operators]]: as an alternative for {{tt|!}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

void show(bool z, const char* s, int n)
{
    const char* r{z ? " true  " : " false "};
    if (n == 0) std::cout &lt;&lt; "┌───────────┬─────────┐\n";
    if (n &lt;= 1) std::cout &lt;&lt; "│ " &lt;&lt;s&lt;&lt; " │ "&lt;&lt;r&lt;&lt;" │\n";
    if (n == 1) std::cout &lt;&lt; "└───────────┴─────────┘\n";
}

int main()
{
    show(not true , "not true ", 0);
    show(not false, "not false", 1);
}
|output=
┌───────────┬─────────┐
│ not true  │  false  │
│ not false │  true   │
└───────────┴─────────┘
}}
